scenario.title: Apply for a vacancy and register
scenario.step: Given a candidate visits the site for the first time

When a candidate applies for a jobjava.lang.AssertionError: Expected: a string containing "Project management" but: was "Implementing, preparing and performing regular governance and reporting for key technology activities."
Then the candidate should be registered with a complete application
